title: Olympian

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Train (Night): Choose to train for your sprint at night. You will gain 1 skill for doing this.
- Sprint (Day): Choose to sprint. You will receive a number of alive non-Unseen players' roles equal to the number of skill you have.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Using Sprint will reset the number of skill you have.

desc:
Post 1012
*Building up my tolerance for your nonsense.*
